title: Katy Perry slammed for throwing shade at Britney Spears with "shaved head" comment on Grammy Awards red carpet
text:
Celebs Katy Perry slammed for throwing shade at Britney Spears with "shaved head" comment on Grammy Awards red carpet The singer was chatting to Ryan Seacrest live on the E! red carpet when she made the remark   Katy Perry apologises for swearing live on TV   celebs   
Katy Perry has come under fire from Britney Spears fans after she referenced the pop star's meltdown. 
The Roar singer was being interview by E! host Ryan Seacrest ahead of the Grammy Awards on Sunday when he asked about her break from the spotlight. 
"There was a pause in the music for a little while," Ryan said. 
"Yeah that's called taking care of your mental health," Katy replied. 
When he asked how that went, she joked: "Fantastic! And I haven't shaved my head yet." (Photo: Getty Images North America) Read More Grammy Awards 2017 best dressed stars: Adele, Carrie Underwood, Paris Jackson and Heidi Klum steal the show 
Ryan then changed the subject, but Katy also made the reference during another interview with CBS. 
And following her comments, one angry fan wrote on Twitter: "OK FINE I turned on the Grammys and Katy Perry was making a snide ‘Britney breakdown head-shaving’ reference & I'm not down with that. 
Another said: “I just lost all my respect for Katy Perry, well the litle respect I did have for her.” 
A #KatyPerryIsOver hashtag also popped up, much like the one her fans created for Taylor Swift last year. Going green in 2014 (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
